channel.title: Jersey Shore
channel.description:
I'm obsessed with this show. I don't know whether it's the concept, the cast, or the drama, but it's easily addicting. There's so many references I make in real life to this show it's not even funny.
So, who's your favorite out of the cast?
What's your favorite moment?
Are you looking forward to another season?
etc.
For everyone who doesn't know what it is: http://www.mtv.com/shows/jersey_shore/series.jhtml
[img]http://www.mtv.com/onair/jersey_shore/photos/cast/all_2024.jpg[/img]
It's a reality series of a group of Guidos (stereotypical term for a partying Italian) that room together in a Jersey Shore house.

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I’m obsessed with this show. I don’t know whether it’s the concept, the cast, or the drama, but it’s easily addicting. There’s so many references I make in real life to this show it’s not even funny.

So, who’s your favorite out of the cast?

What’s your favorite moment?

Are you looking forward to another season?

etc.

For everyone who doesn’t know what it is:

MTV

Jersey Shore | Season 6 Episodes (TV Series) | MTV

Every summer, thousands of kids head to the Jersey Shore to take part in that East Coast rite of passage: The Share House. In this series, Snooki, JWoww, Sammi Sweetheart, The Situation, Pauly D, Vinny and Ronnie come together to live and work in...

It’s a reality series of a group of Guidos (stereotypical term for a partying Italian) that room together in a Jersey Shore house.
